thread.title: Colton Haynes dresses as Ursula for Halloween party
thread.title_full: Colton Haynes dresses as Ursula for Halloween party - UPI.com

author: Annie Martin
title: Colton Haynes dresses as Ursula for Halloween party
text:
1 of 5 | License Photo LOS ANGELES, Oct. 26 (UPI) -- Colton Haynes was unrecognizable as Ursula at a Halloween party Saturday.
The 27-year-old actor impressed fans with the elaborate costume he wore to portray The Little Mermaid villain. Haynes was joined by friends who dressed as Sailor Moon and Dirty Harry.
"Had to show yall the whole costume wit @austinnichols," he wrote on Instagram. Thx to @erikporn @megan_v_brown @lauraraczka_mua for this yrs insane makeup job!"
Haynes wore professional silicone rubber makeup on his face and chest, and painted his exposed skin Ursula's purple-tinted white hue. The actor wore an equally elaborate costume as Fiona from Shrek last year.
The Arrow star was not the only celebrity to dress up over the weekend -- Kourtney Kardashian , her three kids and niece North West also sported Halloween costumes in a group photo Saturday.
1 of 3 Colton Haynes as 'The Little Mermaid' villain Ursula. Instagram /Colton Haynes Haynes is known for playing Jackson Whittemore on seasons 1 and 2 of MTV drama Teen Wolf , and currently portrays Roy Harper, aka Arsenal, on The CW series Arrow . He also played the DC Comics character in the web series spinoff Arrow: Blood Rush .
